function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Implement targeted vaccination campaigns, promote protective measures, and provide access to healthcare resources for high-risk groups.","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Systemic changes in social and institutional arrangements, strengthening healthcare systems","category":"Social activities / facilitatie social interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Verify information sources, provide context and expert analysis, promote official health organization websites","category":"Promote verified information","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Creating isolation room","category":"Separate water facilities (toilets/bathrooms for contaminated)","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Implement strong cybersecurity measures, regular security audits, and employee training on cybersecurity best practices","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Invest in research and development, address technical challenges, encourage innovation","category":"Absorb surge in service demande","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Guarantee annual surveillance of coronaviruses in humans, animals, and the environment, and combine genomic sequence information as a database","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Conduct regular surveys or use multiple data sources to validate and update calibrated activity counts.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improve indoor air quality, increase ventilation, and reduce
